eu.monnetproject.lemon.oils

Interface Scalar

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContravariantScalar, CovariantScalar
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContravariantScalarImpl, CovariantScalarImpl, ScalarImpl

    public interface Scalar
    A class, whose membership is based on a a datatype property
    Author:
    John McCrae

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Scalar.Degree
      The degree to which the binding between the class and the datatype property holds, specified fuzzily as the percentage of known examples belong to the class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      eu.monnetproject.ontology.Class asClass()

    • Method Detail

      • getBoundTo

        eu.monnetproject.ontology.DatatypeProperty getBoundTo()
        Returns:
        The property this class is defined by

      • getDegree

        Scalar.Degree getDegree()
        Returns:
        The degree of the binding, or null if not degree is specified

      • getThreshold

        eu.monnetproject.ontology.LiteralValue getThreshold()
        Returns:
        A threshold for class membership, or null if no threshold is specified

      • getComparator

        eu.monnetproject.ontology.ObjectProperty getComparator()
        Returns:
        The object property that indicates greaterThan for instances of this class or null if no comparator is specified

        Returns:
        Get this as a Class Object
